name: The Bat Mafia
description:
The bat mafia is an arcade game that starts when you discover a strange baseball bat in the middle of a soccer field. Why is it there? Let's take it.

Oh... no..., NOW YOU CAN'T DROP IT AND IT IS PULLING YOU TO OTHER PEOPLE! ANYONE NEAR WILL DIE!

Try to avoid citizens from dying and defeat The Bat Mafia, that is trying to kill you in order to recover the cursed bat.

❈•≫──────────≪•◦ ❈ ◦•≫──────────≪•❈

Controls:

Movement: arrows / WASD.

Camera: mouse.

❈•≫──────────≪•◦ ❈ ◦•≫──────────≪•❈

Made for the Kenney Jam 2020 by:

- Fernando 'Nanref' Martín.

- Samuel 'Thund3r' Ríos.
